content: Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Some overlap with "algebra and CT", but it needed its own stream sooner or later.

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: mathematics instead. Some overlap with "algebra and CT", but it needed its own stream sooner or later (ndr, no it didn't :).
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream theory: algebraic topology & homological algebra to deprecated: algebraic topology & homological algebra.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.
